header.name: chaos/preprocessor/logical/not.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a logical NOT operator.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to the logical NOT of its operand.

usage.param: The operand whose logical "not" is to be produced. Valid values range from 0 to .

macro.para: If x is 0, this macro expands to 1. Otherwise, it expands to 0.
This macro performs a Boolean conversion on its operand. If this conversion is undesirable, may be used instead.
